      • retrieveSetFolderPermission

        public ArrayList<AccessPermission> retrieveSetFolderPermission(Folder folder,
                                                               boolean includePublic)
        Retrieves permissions that have been explicitly set for the folders with the exception of the public read permission if specified in the parameter. The call for that is a separate method
        Parameters:
        folder - folder whose permissions are being retrieved
        includePublic - whether to include public access if set
        Returns:
        list of permissions that have been found for the specified folder

      • propagateFolderPermissions

        public boolean propagateFolderPermissions(String userId,
                                          Folder folder,
                                          boolean add)
        Propagates the permissions for the folder to the contained entries
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier for account of user requesting action that led to this call
        folder - folder user permissions are being propagated
        add - true if folder is to be added, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if action permission was propagated successfully

      • setFolderPermissions

        public FolderDetails setFolderPermissions(String userId,
                                          long folderId,
                                          ArrayList<AccessPermission> permissions)
